metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29417 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in libbzip3.a in bzip3 1.2.2. Thereis a bz3_decompress out-of-bounds read in certain situations where bufferspassed to bzip3 do not contain enough space to be filled with decompresseddata. NOTE: the vendor's perspective is that the observed behavior can onlyoccur for a contract violation, and thus the report is invalid.

criterions.comment: bzip3 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
